mapper.delete: delete from campus_cart where u_userid = #{u_userid} and c_cartnumber = #{c_cartnumber}
mapper.update: update campus_product set p_stock = (p_stock-#{p_stock}) where p_number = #{p_number}
update campus_product set p_stock = (p_stock+#{p_stock}) where p_number = #{p_number}
mapper.select: select o_number from campus_order where success_code = #{success_code}

mapper.select: select o_number from campus_order where o_ordercode = #{o_ordercode}

insert into campus_camping (c_number, c_name, c_area, c_sysdate, c_rsysdate, c_content, c_pay, c_phone, u_userid, c_nname) values(CAMPUS_CAMPING_SEQUENCE.nextval, #{c_name}, #{c_area}, sysdate, #{c_rsysdate}, #{c_content}, #{c_pay}, #{c_phone}, #{u_userid}, #{c_nname})
